channel.title: WordPress on Antonio Ortiz
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress on Antonio Ortiz

item.title: Blog
item.description: Blog Billy Joel made a WordPress Blog! Blog, a CTF room based around exploiting a WordPress blog! We’ll start by adding the machine’s ip address to our hosts file. echo target-ip blog.thm >> /etc/hosts And then move on to some reconnaissance. Recon First we’ll run an nmap scan of the target, using nmap’s “default” scripts (-sC) and version scanner (-sV). nmap -sC -sV -T4 blog.thm Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-01-05 02:16 EST Nmap scan report for blog.
